arts.ttl: Lazio held to goalless draw at Pisa; Cagliari loses to Sassuolo
arts.sum: Lazio remained in midtable, six points below the top four, while Pisa — which is yet to win a match — moved above Hellas Verona to 17th-placed on goal difference. Cagliari is without a win in five matches after a 2-1 loss at home to Sassuolo.

arts.ttl: Serie A | Cagliari 1-2 Sassuolo: Big victory in relegation battle
arts.sum: Sassuolo secured a big away win in this relegation dogfight thanks to the Armand Laurienté...

arts.ttl: Cagliari vs. Sassuolo: one point difference
arts.sum: Cagliari host Sassuolo at the Unipol Domus on matchday 9 in Serie A. Cagliari`s record after eight matchdays is identical to that of the 2024/25 Serie A season: two wins, three draws, three defeats and eight goals scored.

Cagliari come into this match hoping to gain their fourth successive head to head victory against Sassuolo. However Cagliari are not in the best of form having failed to win in their last four games ...

arts.ttl: Cagliari vs. Sassuolo - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Thursday's Serie A clash between Cagliari and Sassuolo, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
